m_szDocSumamry: Method for Determining Battery Pack Isolation Resistance Via Dual Bus Monitoring US 20130027049 A1 Abstract A method for measuring and calculating the isolation resistance of a battery pack is provided, the method being invulnerable to changes in the bus voltage that may take place between measurements.
